name: Ferrari F40
description: Ferraris are what dreams are made of. Fast and highly exclusive, these Italian supercars push the boundaries of performance and cause a stir wherever they go

name: Ford Endeavour
description: Ford is a legendary car company. It's known as the first auto manufacturer to automate production with an assembly line, pay workers a so-called fair daily wage.

name: Aventador
description: Lamborghini is an Italian brand and manufacturer of luxury sports cars and SUVs. The entire car is made of carbon fibre, except the steel roof and the doors

name: Mercedes-Benz EQC
description: The comfort, the premium upholstery, the plush carpeting, polished wood trim, sleek styling, LED mood lighting and even the scent signals that this vehicle is special

name: GranTurismo
description: Maserati is one of the world's most glamorous automotive manufacturers, rich in tradition and sporting successes.  Their logo is shaped like Neptune's trident and elegance and speed

name: Range Rover Evoque
description: The Range Rover is a 4x4 motor car produced by Land Rover. Range Rover achieves a smooth, relaxing drive by adjusting its height through the Electronic Air Suspension
